pages.text: Hard, sharp and yet surprisingly brittle. These stones are found everywhere in $(l:dimension/razor_edge)Razor Edge$(/l).

pages.title: Slabs & Stairs
pages.text: Unless $(thing)silk touched$(), Pyrite shatters into items, requiring you to combine them again.

pages.title: All Variants
pages.text: You can form Pyrite into many decorational blocks via $(item)Crafting$() or using the $(item)Stonecutter$().

pages.title: Pyrite Rippers
pages.text: $(italic)Those sharp things are tearing you apart.$()$(br2)Well, your clothes, for the most part. But still, point stands.
